```{r setup}
library(doodleproblem)
library(tidyverse)
library(tictoc)
```




# Parameters

```{r}
n_colleagues <- 3
p <- 3
o <- 10
dep <- 0
```


# Doodle match probability


```{r}
prob_doodle_match(n_colleagues = 5,
                  o = 10,
                  p = 3,
                  dep = 0)
```

We can also a somewhat more detailled output by setting `return_prob` to `FALSE`:




```{r}
prob_doodle_match(n_colleagues = 5,
                  o = 10,
                  p = 3,
                  dep = 0,
                  return_prob = FALSE)
```
